title: Which ones are the most interesting facts about historic memory, and why is that? - Quora

response.answer_text: Being able to recall your time within the womb Or trying to forget a traumatic event, and it wont go away no matter what. Imagine the power alone that goes into that
The ‘human computer’ calculations performed by the women who helped get us to the Moon. Their story was told well in “Hidden Figures.”
